item.original: Fuel into car until nozzle click
Park car in front of a fueling station
Insert fuel pump into the gas tank of your car
Pull lever to begin fueling your car
When finished pull fuel pump lever again to stop fueling
Place fuel pump back on the fueling station
Hold down until tank is full
Get in car and go home
Drive up to a pump on the same side as gas tank.
Remove fuel nozzle from fuel station gas tank
Place fuel nozzle into gas tank on car.
Allow fuel to dispense till it auto stops
Replace fuel nozzle to gas pump.
Replace the cap on car fuel tank.
Go inside fuel station to pay clerk for fuel.
Hang up the pump when finished
Park the car next to the pump
Press the fuel cap button to open the fuel cap
Tell the attendant to fill gas as much as desired
Give the money to the attendant
Pull up to a pump with the gas tank on the side closest to pump.
Keep filling to tank is full.
Park in front of gas pump
park in front of gas pump
remove nozzle from pump and place in tank
when full remove nozzle and replace on pump
get in car and drive away
Park next to pump on same side as gas tank door.
Slide credit card in pump machine and choose payment options.
Select grade of fuel you desire.
Pump gas until full or to desired cost point.
Park car at a gas pump
Go into gas station and pay for gas
Go back to car and open gas tank door
Insert nozzle into gas tank on car
Stop pumping and remove nozzle when completed
Park car next to gas pump.

Pull lever on nozzle to pump gas.

Insert nozzle into fuel tank opening.
Squeeze the lever on the nozzle.
Pump the amount of gas you need.

Select which grade of gasoline you need
Place end of nozzle into hole under where the gas cap was
Squeeze lever under the handle of the nozzle
Allow gas to flow into tank
Replace nozzle back into pump rest
Drive the car to the gas station

Place the nozzle inside the car's tank

Pull the gas nozzle from its dock

Swipe credit or debit card at pump
Insert the nozzle into the car.
Pull the lever to start the gas flowing.
Hold the lever until the tank is filled.

put fuel pump in gas tank

Run credit card through machine to pay for gas.
Put cap back on fuel tank.

Pump until gas stops or at price you want

Park the car with the gas pump close to the gas cap.
Go inside and pay the cashier desired amount.
Open the pump door gas cap on side of car.
Put the pump in the hole.
Pump gas until you have pumped the amount you paid for.
Remove the pump from the car.
Place pump back on the holder.
Close the gas cap and pump door.

Put the nozzle into the car.

select appropriate options including fuel octane rating
remove pump nozzle from pump machine and place in car's fuel tank
squeeze pump nozzle until it clicks off
remove pump nozzle from car, returning it to pump machine

Fill your car until the pump stops automatically

Start the engine and leave the filling station
